content.text: Match ends, Aston Villa 1, Leicester City 1.
Second Half ends, Aston Villa 1, Leicester City 1.
Substitution, Aston Villa. Scott Sinclair replaces Jordan Ayew.
Libor Kozák (Aston Villa) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Fuchs (Leicester City).
Attempt missed. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Daniel Drinkwater with a through ball.
Demarai Gray (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordan Veretout (Aston Villa).
Foul by Jamie Vardy (Leicester City).
Jores Okore (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Libor Kozák (Aston Villa) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Rudy Gestede with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Hand ball by Leonardo Ulloa (Leicester City).
Substitution, Leicester City. Demarai Gray replaces Marc Albrighton.
Leandro Bacuna (Aston Villa) is shown the yellow card.
Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Leicester City. Christian Fuchs tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Libor Kozák.
Offside, Leicester City. Daniel Drinkwater tries a through ball, but Jamie Vardy is caught offside.
Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wes Morgan (Leicester City).
Attempt missed. Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jamie Vardy with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Jores Okore.
Robert Huth (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Aston Villa 1, Leicester City 1. Rudy Gestede (Aston Villa) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner.
Rudy Gestede (Aston Villa) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Fuchs (Leicester City).
Corner,  Aston Villa. Conceded by Christian Fuchs.
Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City).
N'Golo Kanté (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jordan Veretout (Aston Villa).
Foul by Leonardo Ulloa (Leicester City).
Joleon Lescott (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Leicester City. Leonardo Ulloa replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Attempt missed. Libor Kozák (Aston Villa) header from very close range is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Jordan Veretout with a cross following a set piece situation.
Jordan Ayew (Aston Villa) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by N'Golo Kanté (Leicester City).
Substitution, Aston Villa. Rudy Gestede replaces Carles Gil.
Attempt missed. Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jamie Vardy with a cross.
Attempt saved. Leandro Bacuna (Aston Villa) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jordan Ayew.
Foul by Robert Huth (Leicester City).
Libor Kozák (Aston Villa) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Leicester City. Ritchie de Laet replaces Shinji Okazaki.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Mark Bunn.
Attempt saved. Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Christian Fuchs.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Aly Cissokho.
Foul by Leandro Bacuna (Aston Villa).
Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt blocked. Jordan Ayew (Aston Villa) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Leandro Bacuna with a cross.
Foul by Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City).
Ashley Westwood (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Idrissa Gueye (Aston Villa) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a corner.
Corner,  Aston Villa. Conceded by Robert Huth.
Attempt blocked. Leandro Bacuna (Aston Villa) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Aly Cissokho (Aston Villa) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Ashley Westwood.
Attempt missed. Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Daniel Drinkwater.
Second Half begins Aston Villa 0, Leicester City 1.
First Half ends, Aston Villa 0, Leicester City 1.
Foul by Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City).
Aly Cissokho (Aston Villa) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Mark Bunn (Aston Villa) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
